Title: Relates to commuter passes on the New York state thruway in the Syracuse area
Summary: Authorizes the New York state thruway authority to issue annual short distance commuter permits which shall provide for travel at no charge between interchanges in permit areas.
LawCode: Amd ยง378, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to commuter passes on the New York state thruway in the Syracuse area; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
